section.title: Web Application/URL Monitor
section.para: This agent is used to monitor web applications using POST or GET http requests.

sect2.title: Local/Remote Modes
sect2.para: Because of the nature of its work, the agent should only be deployed in local mode.

sect2.title: Supported Versions
sect2.para: The agent can monitor any URL/Web application using GET or POST http requests.

sect2.title: Configuration
sect2.para: The following parameters are available for configuration:

itemizedlist.listitem: HTTP method: the type of http request to use: GET or POST
HTTP request parameters: a user defined list of parameters for the http request

sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The agent will populate the following values:

itemizedlist.listitem: Response time: Ping response time in milliseconds
Response size (bytes): The number of bytes in the server response
Response content: The content of the server response
Response status code: The http response status code

section.para: The agent will use an 'User-Agent' http parameter equal to 'IxoraRMS' in order to allow the user to filter out any accesses from the web server's log file originating from the monitoring tool.
